apple_vendor_description: This romantic embrace on Apple devices features two women, one with a medium skin tone and the other with a neutral, unspecified skin tone, sharing a tender kiss.  Their lips are softly pursed, and their faces are turned towards each other with eyes closed, embodying affection and intimacy.  The Apple design language imbues the figures with a gentle glow and smooth gradients, emphasizing the warmth and sweetness of the moment, making it a tender way to express love or deep fondness.
